Check the pick roller cam for damage. NOTE The rotation of the pick roller cam triggers the movement of the wiper bracket. 8. Replace the sensor (toner density). 9. Replace the pick roller cam. Procedure (Photoconductor measurement error) 1. Check the imaging unit contacts for contamination. 2. Check the imaging unit for leaks and damage. 3. Clean or replace the imaging unit. 4. Reseat the smart chip contact cable on the MFP board. 8. Check whether the imaging unit installed is genuine. 9. Check the imaging unit contacts for contamination. 10. Check the toner delivery mechanism for damage. 11. Check the photoconductor drum for scratches and damage. 12. Clean or replace the imaging unit.
